## Content Structure

- Homepage with hero section, map, plot listings, village info, contact

## URL Pattern

```
/           → Redirects to /cs/
/cs/        → Czech homepage
/en/        → English homepage
/pl/        → Polish homepage
/cs/offer/[slug]/  → Czech plot details
/en/offer/[slug]/  → English plot details
/pl/offer/[slug]/  → Polish plot details
```

## Plot Data Format

Each plot listing includes:
- Unique ID (e.g., A-12, B-1)
- Language-specific URL slugs
- Size in square meters (m²)
- Price per m² and total price in CZK
- Status: active, discounted, reserved, or inactive
- Multiple photos with lightbox gallery
- Descriptions in all 3 languages (supports Markdown)
- Features: utilities, access type, zoning
- Map position coordinates

## About Raduň Village

- Located 6-7 km southeast of Opava, 30 km from Ostrava
- Population: ~1,200 inhabitants
- Moravian-Silesian Region, Opava District
- Known for Raduň State Chateau (empírový komplex) and its dendrologically valuable park
- Primary school and kindergarten in village
- Good transport: MHD line 218 to Opava, road I/11, D1 highway nearby
- Quiet rural location with growing population
- Elevation: ~284 m above sea level

## Nearby Cities

- Opava: 6-7 km (10 min by car, MHD available)
- Ostrava: 30 km (25 min by car via D1)
- Ostrava-Mošnov Airport: 40-50 min
